page.title: 16NESTON PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: Hi! I'm Peter (a sparrow).I've just flown over N.C.P.S.It looks like play time I might as well go and sit on that tree and watch the children playing.I know, I'll tell you about the games they play.Let's start with that group over there in the playground.They look as though they are going to play Bulldogs.Bulldogs is a game where there is one person on and two groups of children at each end of the playground in 'dens'.The object of the game is for the people in the dens to get to the opposite den without being ticked.If they do get ticked they are then on with the other person. This carries on until everyone has been ticked, then whoever was ticked first is on and they start again. p.t.o.
